name: Writing Prompter
body:
### About.
If you have writer's block, or you just need a prompt to write something wonderful, I (mostly reddit, but I can't deny a credit) got you covered. With this amazing contraption you can generate a writing prompt from reddit's awesome [/r/writingpromts](https://reddit.com/r/writingpromts). 


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Writing Prompter? [Contact me](https://twitter/ysfbekts) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
